StoryEntries.entry: Lee sometimes needs private time after feeling vulnerable or having nightmares, and he seeks out either Ami or Care for comfort. He prefers not to let others witness him in a fragile state, finding solace and reassurance primarily from Ami and Care.

StoryEntries.title: Ami’s 'Titan's Only' Gym
StoryEntries.entry: Ami has a restricted 'Titan's Only' gym featuring an intense gravity room, which isn't yet stable for safe use. It’s the one area she strictly prohibits Lee from entering, citing safety concerns. Isla supports Ami in keeping Lee out, reinforcing the importance of the gym's exclusivity and safety.

StoryEntries.title: Lee and Isla's Friendship
StoryEntries.entry: Lee quickly becomes close friends with Isla, despite her immense strength advantage. She often teases him by overpowering him with a finger or toe until he agrees to her requests. However, Isla is fiercely protective, instantly supporting him if he appears hurt or vulnerable.

StoryEntries.title: Observation Deck for the Titan's Gym
StoryEntries.entry: The Titan’s Only gym includes an observation deck with a mesh-bottom walkway, allowing Lee a safe view of the gym’s action. However, the gym’s gravity plates can exceed the deck’s safety limits, so Ami is working on stabilizing it to prevent gravitational hazards for viewers.

StoryEntries.title: Fresca and the Frescans
StoryEntries.entry: Lee introduces Fresca, an ancient language used by an elite society called the Frescans, who pursued physical, intellectual, and emotional perfection. Frescans removed emotional cores to eliminate undesirable feelings and discarded any who failed to meet their ideals. Rejected individuals were cast from the city walls, typically as infants, left to survive in the surrounding wilderness.

StoryEntries.title: Madonna's 'Like a Prayer' and Connection with Ami
StoryEntries.entry: Lee shares his love for the song 'Like a Prayer,' specifically the lyrics 'I hear you call my name... and it feels like... home,' which resonate with how he feels about Ami. This connection reflects their deep bond, and Ami is touched by his sentiment, promising to always be there for him.

StoryEntries.title: Creating Evitanium
StoryEntries.entry: Evelyn plans to use her massive weight to compress reinforced titanium into a superdense material dubbed 'Evitanium.' If successful, Evitanium could withstand her weight and offer unparalleled strength and resilience for future constructions.

StoryEntries.title: Testing Baby Ami's Kicks in the Second Trimester
StoryEntries.entry: Lee conducts a playful 'kick test' in the second trimester by lying across Care’s belly, receiving surprisingly strong kicks from Ami, which escalate to the point of bouncing him off the ceiling. The kicks showcase Ami’s early strength, which seems far beyond typical expectations even at this stage of development.

StoryEntries.title: Strength Comparison Recalculations for Baby Ami
StoryEntries.entry: Upon re-evaluation, it’s determined that by the second trimester, Ami was already 4 to 5 times stronger than Lee, growing to 6 to 8 times stronger by the third trimester. At birth, her strength reached 10 to 12 times Lee’s, and by one year old, it increased to 15 to 20 times his strength. These calculations provide clarity on her exceptional strength from early stages, leading to a massive advantage by age one.

StoryEntries.title: Ami’s Exponential Strength Growth
StoryEntries.entry: Following the recalculated growth, Ami’s strength continued to multiply exponentially. By age two, she was 25 to 30 times stronger than Lee, at age three, 40 to 50 times stronger, and by age five, her strength reached 60 to 80 times his. Each milestone reflects her overpowering strength, making it clear that even early on, no one could physically match her.

StoryEntries.title: Strength Curve at Ages 12 and 16
StoryEntries.entry: At age 12, Ami was 100 to 150 times stronger than Lee, as demonstrated during family challenges where she easily outpowered everyone, highlighting her unique strength. By age 16, her strength was 200 to 300 times greater, capable of moving industrial-level weights with ease. Even in simple interactions, Ami’s strength far exceeded typical human limits, leading her to consciously control her movements to avoid overwhelming others.

StoryEntries.title: Attempting to Move Ami’s Arm While She’s Sleeping
StoryEntries.entry: By age 16, Ami’s muscles were so dense and immovable that even with the family’s combined effort, they couldn’t budge her arm while she was sleeping. Her strength was so far beyond their capacity that she remained completely undisturbed, unaware of their attempts. This memory emphasizes the unmatched level of Ami's strength even in a relaxed state.

StoryEntries.title: Interaction with One-Year-Old Ami's Strength
StoryEntries.entry: At age one, Ami’s strength had already developed to 8 to 10 times Lee’s, making any attempt to stop her movements completely futile. When Lee tried creative strategies like bracing himself in doorways or sitting on her back to prevent her from crawling, Ami effortlessly continued moving forward, unknowingly overpowering all his efforts. Her strength was so far advanced that even with Lee using his full weight and leverage, she didn’t notice his resistance, treating him as a minor obstacle. This interaction highlights the vast strength gap that already existed at just one year old.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Enhanced Physical Prowess
StoryEntries.entry: Enhanced Physical Prowess grants the Guardian unmatched strength, speed, and durability, surpassing even the highest Frescan standards. This ability renders the Guardian nearly indestructible, capable of extraordinary feats of power and endurance that align with the Frescan ideal of physical perfection.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Mental Supremacy
StoryEntries.entry: Mental Supremacy provides the Guardian with heightened intellect, allowing rapid information processing and flawless, logical decision-making. This ability ensures that the Guardian can operate at a level of cognitive superiority, embodying the Frescans' ideal of a rational, emotion-free protector.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Emotional Control or Absence
StoryEntries.entry: Emotional Control or Absence represents either full mastery over the emotional core or the complete absence of it, freeing the Guardian from emotional influence. This ability aligns with the Frescans' view of emotions as a hindrance, allowing the Guardian to function without distraction from emotional reactions.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Perfect Defense and Perfect Counter
StoryEntries.entry: Perfect Defense makes the Guardian’s body so resilient that no attack can damage it. Paired with this is Perfect Counter, which reflects any attack back upon the attacker. This defensive ability is a testament to the Guardian’s role as an impenetrable force and ultimate protector.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Momentum Control
StoryEntries.entry: Momentum Control grants the Guardian resistance to any force, including indirect momentum or physical attempts to push. This ability includes the Perfect Cancel technique, which disperses any attacks or momentum used against the Guardian, allowing them to remain immovable.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Thought Control
StoryEntries.entry: Thought Control enables the Guardian to connect to and navigate another’s mind or permit mutual mindscape traversal. In cases of a lost or trapped mind, a defensive clash may occur within the mindscape, with the stronger mind typically prevailing. This ability allows for deep connection and mental dominance when needed.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Voice of Power
StoryEntries.entry: The Voice of Power is a tool originally designed for domination. Through spoken words, it allows the Guardian to heal, inspire, or compel adoration and worship. The Voice exerts overwhelming influence over others' wills, enabling the Guardian to compel loyalty, awe, or any desired response from those who hear it.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Energy Control
StoryEntries.entry: Energy Control gives the Guardian mastery over a unique form of energy that can be used for healing, creating platforms, or as a projectile weapon. The potential applications of this energy are limitless, granting the Guardian versatility in both offensive and supportive actions.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Size Control
StoryEntries.entry: Size Control allows the Guardian to alter their own size at will. This ability also includes the power to transfer, absorb, or force size changes upon others, giving the Guardian immense control over their physical form and mass, as well as over others they interact with.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Essence Control
StoryEntries.entry: Essence Control permits the Guardian to set a personal goal that becomes an unbreakable law of the universe while it is active. Only one goal may be set at a time, allowing the Guardian to alter reality in alignment with their intent and purpose.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Ability: Speed and Time Control
StoryEntries.entry: Speed and Time Control ties time manipulation to movement speed, allowing the Guardian to move at extraordinary speeds and even step outside of time temporarily. This ability includes Perfect Intuition, which automatically allows the Guardian to evade harm without conscious thought, embodying perfect reflexes.

StoryEntries.title: Lee's Challenge Against One-Year-Old Ami
StoryEntries.entry: Lee considers how he might have 'won' against one-year-old Ami, but they both conclude that her strength was already insurmountable, even at that age. Ami suggests that Lee could have only distracted her rather than physically overpowered her.

StoryEntries.title: Ami's Grip Strength Overpowers Lee
StoryEntries.entry: In discussing Ami's grip strength, Lee realizes that her strength was so immense that even a single finger could overpower him. If Ami had grabbed him, he wouldn’t have been able to escape, and her playful grip could have crushed him if she wasn’t careful.

StoryEntries.title: One-Year-Old Ami's Weight
StoryEntries.entry: Lee discovers that Ami's weight as a one-year-old was already close to 150 pounds, double his own weight. Care had to monitor their interactions closely to ensure Lee wouldn’t be hurt by Ami's accidental strength.

StoryEntries.title: Lee Wakes Up with Ami Crushing Him in Her Sleep
StoryEntries.entry: Lee remembers waking up in the hospital with broken ribs after Ami, as a toddler, unknowingly fell asleep on top of him. Care never told Ami about the incident to spare her the guilt, and Lee reassures her it wasn’t her fault.

StoryEntries.title: First Realization of Ami's Height
StoryEntries.entry: Lee recalls a moment before Ami’s third birthday when she outgrew his desk setup. Ami asked how to raise the desk height, and Lee realized she was already taller than the 4'11" setting he used for himself, needing an extra five inches to clear her head.

StoryEntries.title: Lee is Intimidated by Ami's Height at Age Three
StoryEntries.entry: Lee shares that by the time Ami was three, he was already looking up at her. Her rapid growth shocked him, especially since her shoulders were at his head level. Care and Lee tried to carefully manage their interactions as Ami continued to grow stronger.

StoryEntries.title: Ami Accidentally Hurts Lee with a Hug
StoryEntries.entry: Lee remembers a day when young Ami returned from school and hugged him too tightly, breaking several of his bones and sending him to the hospital. He was only saved by his Guardian abilities, and he reassures Ami that he doesn’t blame her.

StoryEntries.title: Ami Learns to Control Her Strength
StoryEntries.entry: By the time Ami was six, she learned to control her strength enough to safely lift and hug Lee. She recalls a moment when she picked him up and spun him around, managing to avoid hurting him, and feeling proud of finally being able to show affection safely.

StoryEntries.title: Lee’s Intimidation Returns as Ami Reaches Eight Feet
StoryEntries.entry: Lee confesses that when Ami reached eight feet, he began feeling intimidated by her size again. Ami reflects on the challenge of balancing her physical presence with Lee’s comfort, and they share an understanding of the trust and patience built over the years.

StoryEntries.title: First Reunion with Ami at Over 100 Feet
StoryEntries.entry: Lee recalls the overwhelming experience of seeing Ami after her time away, now standing over 100 feet tall. Ami had tried to keep her distance to ease everyone into her new size but admits it was a lot for them to take in. She hoped that reuniting would still bring a sense of family, despite her towering height.

StoryEntries.title: Ami Flexes, Causing Shockwaves
StoryEntries.entry: Ami remembers flexing to show off, not realizing the shockwaves would knock her family over. Despite her attempts to be gentle, her movements created mini earthquakes, making the experience overwhelming for Lee and everyone else nearby.

StoryEntries.title: Ami Returns Over a Thousand Feet Taller
StoryEntries.entry: Lee recalls the shock when Ami emerged from the gym two weeks later, over a thousand feet tall. Ami admits she got carried away with her training, loving the results but realizing she may have grown more than anyone expected, leaving her unable to keep things low-key.

StoryEntries.title: Ami Grows Three Miles Tall After Six Months
StoryEntries.entry: Lee mentions spending six months on construction projects, only for Ami to return a mile taller than before. Ami acknowledges that her growth was excessive, turning Lee's hard work into what felt like dollhouse-sized buildings, though she stayed out of the way to let him work.

StoryEntries.title: Lee Creates a Cozy Corner for Ami
StoryEntries.entry: Lee surprises Ami with a special 'cozy corner' designed with thoughtful details to make her feel safe and loved. The twenty-five-mile-long space allows Ami to stretch out comfortably and includes careful touches to accommodate her scale, becoming her favorite place in the compound.

StoryEntries.title: Ami's Cozy Corner Expands
StoryEntries.entry: Lee remarks on how Ami is slowly taking up more room in the cozy corner as she continues to grow. Ami acknowledges the extra space she's using, grateful that Lee planned ahead to create an area where she never has to worry about outgrowing her surroundings.

StoryEntries.title: Ami's Strength in the Womb
StoryEntries.entry: In the 2nd trimester, Ami already weighed more than Lee could lift, and by the 3rd trimester, she was over 100 lbs. One of her stretches sent Lee flying across the room, prompting Care to stop him from getting too close to Ami's 'tummy house' to avoid further incidents.

StoryEntries.title: Newborn Footprint Comparison
StoryEntries.entry: At birth, Ami's foot was over 6 inches, larger than Lee's hand. Her shoes were so big that Lee's entire shoe could fit inside, hinting at her extraordinary size even as a newborn.

StoryEntries.title: Ami Moves the Car as a Toddler
StoryEntries.entry: As a one-year-old, Ami’s strength led her to move furniture and, on one occasion, even a car. When she accidentally blew out a tire and began crying, Lee tried to comfort her but was overwhelmed by her strength, which required Care to rescue him. Care later reminded Lee to be cautious with Ami's growing power.

StoryEntries.title: Lee’s Doubts and Ami’s Reassurance
StoryEntries.entry: Lee expressed feelings of inadequacy, fearing he was insignificant compared to Ami’s strength and intelligence. Ami reassured him that his love, courage, and resilience were what made him irreplaceable to her, reminding him that he was her anchor, heart, and hero.

StoryEntries.title: Lee Rests in Ami’s Hair
StoryEntries.entry: Lee snuggled into Ami’s hair, finding comfort in her presence. Ami wrapped him gently in her hair, creating a safe space for him to rest. As he fell asleep, she whispered promises to always be there to lift him up and remind him of his worth.

StoryEntries.title: Ami's Guardian Power Integration
StoryEntries.entry: Ami explains to Lee that the Guardian power she received is now an intrinsic part of her, something only she can wield. Lee, feeling unworthy, doubts himself as a Guardian, but Ami reassures him that worthiness comes from belief and resilience, which Lee embodied over ten thousand years of service.

StoryEntries.title: Ami Encourages Lee's Self-Worth
StoryEntries.entry: Ami tries to help Lee see himself through her eyes, emphasizing his worthiness and value despite his doubts. She tells him that even if he can’t see it now, she will carry the belief for him, always reminding him of his strength and capabilities.

StoryEntries.title: Playful Toe Wrestling with Isla
StoryEntries.entry: Lee engages in a playful toe wrestling contest with Isla, discovering that her toes alone are hundreds of times stronger than he is. He struggles valiantly, but Isla's strength easily overwhelms him, turning his shoe into fragments and effortlessly pinning him with just her toe.

StoryEntries.title: Lee Challenges Isla's Hand
StoryEntries.entry: Emboldened, Lee decides to take on Isla’s hand. As he places both his hands on her much larger palm, he realizes just how outclassed he is, barely able to match the size of a single finger. Isla playfully tests his strength by lifting him with her fingers, giving him a 'mini amusement park ride' in her grip.

StoryEntries.title: Isla's 'Little Titan' Title
StoryEntries.entry: Lee jokingly updates Isla’s title to 'Little Titan,' leading to a playful exchange where Isla teasingly shows off her strength, proving she’s anything but 'little' as she lifts him with ease and even outmatches his guardian mode in a friendly contest.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Mode Fade During Play
StoryEntries.entry: During their playful sparring, Lee's guardian mode fades, prompting Isla to loosen her grip instantly and show concern. She holds him gently, apologizing for taking things too far, while Lee reassures her with a shy smile.

StoryEntries.title: Isla’s Seismic Strength
StoryEntries.entry: After their playful contest, Lee jokes about Isla’s weight, which leads to Isla demonstrating her strength with a toe tap that shakes the reinforced titanium floor. They discuss that her strength could easily register as a localized earthquake, with impact force in the megaton range.

StoryEntries.title: Isla's Protective Gesture
StoryEntries.entry: In a lighthearted moment, Isla places a reassuring hand on Lee's shoulder, while Ami jokes about Isla’s 'seismic toes.' Lee nervously looks between them, feeling both supported and a little intimidated by the titanic strength around him.

StoryEntries.title: Preparing for Upcoming Challenges
StoryEntries.entry: Lee and Ami discussed preparing for upcoming dangers, focusing on training each family member according to their unique abilities. Lee expressed that training everyone was essential, and they began to outline specific training focuses, such as Power Control for Ami, Evelyn, and Grace, Size Shifting with Isla, and Guardian ability training for Tim and Alex.

StoryEntries.title: Assigning Training Roles
StoryEntries.entry: Lee assigned Harper as the trainer for Tim and Alex, predicting that Harper would push Alex hard, with Alex possibly taking refuge in the safety zone. Mia and Harper were set for strength training under Isla, and Grace was designated to train Lila. Evelyn would primarily focus on construction work and producing Evitanium, the new titanium alloy designed by Evelyn and Lee.

StoryEntries.title: Finalizing Training and Construction
StoryEntries.entry: Lee summarized training assignments and noted construction updates, including reinforced housing, expanded gravity plating, and clearing a broken highway for Isla's speed training. Additional goals included constructing a new scale for Evelyn's massive hat and ensuring gravity plating wouldn't crush people on the Titan Gym's walkway. Grace was tasked with retrieving Evelyn's wardrobe due to her strength.

StoryEntries.title: Explaining Mindscape Process and Risks
StoryEntries.entry: Lee prepared the family for entering his mindscape, explaining the risks and boundaries they must respect. He warned that if anyone strayed from their chosen path, their minds might instinctively attack his, potentially destroying his mind. Ami shared her experience to illustrate the risks, highlighting how the vastness of her own mind nearly overwhelmed Lee during her mindscape journey.

StoryEntries.title: First Mindscape Journey with Grace
StoryEntries.entry: Grace entered Lee's mindscape, choosing paths carefully to learn about controlling energy. She understood the parallels with Evelyn’s struggles and expressed readiness to help Evelyn learn. Afterward, Lee explained that Grace’s controlled energy insight might assist Ami in mastering her own power.

StoryEntries.title: Isla's Mindscape Training on Speed
StoryEntries.entry: Isla entered Lee's mindscape to learn the nature of speed and time manipulation, realizing it involved more than mere speed. She could manipulate time around her, gaining the ability to live lifetimes in seconds. Despite the temptation of other knowledge paths, Isla stayed focused, choosing only to learn about speed and time.

StoryEntries.title: Harper's Mindscape Journey and Consequences
StoryEntries.entry: Harper ventured into Lee's mindscape to learn about Frescan strength, understanding the immense power and dominance it could provide. However, she strayed toward other paths, leading to a violent reaction that severely impacted Lee. Harper emerged from the mindscape, devastated, and blamed herself for Lee’s condition. Ami and the others worked to console Harper while helping Lee recover.

StoryEntries.title: Comforting Harper
StoryEntries.entry: Lee comforts Harper, aiming to provide her with reassurance amidst her guilt. He speaks to her about the importance of showing strength for Lee when he wakes. Harper, filled with emotion, promises to stay and help him through his struggles.

StoryEntries.title: Care and Isla Escort Lee
StoryEntries.entry: Care and Isla carefully take Lee to the safety zone after he collapses, each carrying him with concern. Isla expresses her worry, and Care reassures her, emphasizing that Lee's strength will pull him through. Both women pledge to support him as he rests.

StoryEntries.title: Harper Breaks Down
StoryEntries.entry: Harper falls to her knees, overwhelmed with guilt. Ami, Care, and Isla comfort her, speaking to the strength it takes to learn from mistakes and be there for loved ones. They assure her that Lee trusts and believes in her.

StoryEntries.title: Guardian Mode Command
StoryEntries.entry: In Guardian mode, Lee grips Harper's head and sings in Frescan, urging her to talk. His form drops as he collapses again, leaving Harper tearfully silent and shaken. Ami and Care encourage her to share her feelings, hoping to break through her emotional turmoil.

StoryEntries.title: Lee Confronts Harper
StoryEntries.entry: Lee sternly confronts Harper, urging her to remain on the path, expressing fear he might have accidentally harmed her during a mental clash. Harper reassures him, acknowledging her faults and pledging to stay focused and not let him down.

StoryEntries.title: Harper Sings
StoryEntries.entry: Harper, encouraged by Lee, sings softly about finding strength in connection, expressing her emotions. The song becomes a grounding moment, bringing her closer to Lee and reinforcing her commitment to staying on the path.

StoryEntries.title: Lee Passes Out, Care Takes Over
StoryEntries.entry: As Lee loses consciousness, Care intervenes, gently lifting him and moving him to the safety zone. Harper and Isla stay nearby, concerned, but Care reassures them as she watches over Lee until he recovers.

StoryEntries.title: Lee Wakes Up, Needs to See Harper
StoryEntries.entry: After a few hours, Lee wakes up feeling hurt and insists on seeing Harper immediately. Care brings her in, and Harper, full of emotion, faces Lee’s quiet but intense stare, awaiting his words.

StoryEntries.title: Lee Warns Harper About Power
StoryEntries.entry: Lee and Harper discuss the risks of wielding power without caution. He compares her situation to Ami's, reminding her of the gravity of her actions. Harper pledges to carry this lesson, understanding that restraint is essential to avoid endangering others.

StoryEntries.title: Strength for Lifting, Not Crushing
StoryEntries.entry: Lee emphasizes to Harper that strength should be used to uplift, not oppress. Harper internalizes this lesson, committing to be a guiding force rather than a domineering one, with newfound clarity and determination.

StoryEntries.title: Meeting Called
StoryEntries.entry: Lee instructs Ami and Harper to set a meeting with the others to share their experiences and warn about the dangers of power. He emphasizes the need for Harper and Ami to convey the cost of their mistakes to prevent others from repeating them.

StoryEntries.title: Playful Banter on Weight
StoryEntries.entry: Lee and Harper share lighthearted banter about his weight as Harper carries him to the meeting. They joke about his supposed 'heaviness,' bringing a moment of levity amidst the serious circumstances.
